description: Students apply theories and methods of culture studies to a selected major topic in American culture. The course employs a discussion format, focusing on critical reading and analytic essays. Recent topics include "Sitcom America," "American Adolescence," and "Campus Ecology." Usually offered annually in the spring semester. May be repeated if topic is different.
name: Top: Pub Hist: Civic Life Amer Past
notes: Full course title: Public History: The Civic Life of the American Past
title: American Studies: A Topical Approach
